title: [Bug]: MacOs version terribly slow
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Teams are slow 

### What package are you using?

macOS

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
The loading time of Pinguin Teams is ±12 minutes and the response time on any click is around ±1.5 minutes (typing - the same, 1 letter per 1,5 minutes).
```

### Expected Behavior

Works in normal speed

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
